title: Roasted hake with braised ham hock, mustard sauce, pickled cucumber and warm potato salad
description: Flakes of gammon accompany fried hake. Try making the pickled cucumbers a couple of days in advance for the best taste.
ingredients: ½ cucumber, peeled, quartered lengthways and seeds removed, cut into rectangles
3 garlic cloves, peeled and left whole
2 large waxy potatoes, cut into 1cm/½in cubes
1 tbsp vinaigrette dressing (made from 10% vinegar to 90% olive oil and flavoured with tarragon)
sea purslane and sea aster, to garnish
